title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I open the context menu, I do not see the Team entry.
EB: The Team entry should be visible in the context menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the project containing a .java file and another resource.
2. Right-click to open the context menu.
3. Verify that the Team entry is not present in the context menu.
